renewed-contributions.title: The Science of Life
renewed-contributions.note: Exact issues not specified in CCE renewal record, though it says 'except Sundays'. renewed-contributions.title: The Little King
renewed-contributions.note: This was the first 'Little King' comic to be syndicated by King Features.  Previous comics under this title, created by Otto Soglow, appeared in the New Yorker.  King Features is the only author mentioned in the CCE renewal record.

comment: Pick up with 1965 under Artwork and 1964 Jan-Jun under Contributions
additional-note: Some images from the New York American were renewed separately in the Artwork section, rather than in the Contributions to Periodicals section. The active Artwork renewals begin in the 1956 January-June volume; the active Contributions to Periodicals renewals begin in the 1955 January-June volume.
